1244160.name: Oxygen Not Included Soundtrack
1244160.description:
The soundtrack to Oxygen Not Included is the official way to unwind as your space colony teeters on the brink of disaster. Featuring the original atmospheric music composed and arranged by Vince de Vera, this OST contains all of the game music and bonus tracks, in both FLAC and MP3 formats.

This soundtrack is organized into 2 discs! Disc 1 includes tracks from the original game. Disc 2 includes music from the DLC's and bonus unreleased tracks!

Purchasing the soundtrack on Steam also entitles players to free updates with any additional tracks we may add in the future.
